title: Un Monde Vegan
description: Un Monde Vegan, meaning "a vegan world," features a wide range of products including packaged and chilled foods, faux meats, vegan cheese, snacks and chocolates. Also has nutritional supplements, food for animals, vegan shoes and accessories, eco-friendly cleaning and bodycare products. Shop in-store or online. This is its 2nd retail shop, opened Nov 2015; first one is in Paris.
